App Name: Yahoo Sports

App Package Name: com.yahoo.mobile.client.android.sportacular

Brief:

Yahoo Sports delivers an immersive and comprehensive digital experience for sports enthusiasts. Track real-time updates, watch live local and primetime NFL games, and stay informed on your favorite sports teams and athletes with personalized news.
